entries.entry: We talked about HTML components and how to make grid layouts with Flexbox in CSS.
I tried learn how to structure my .js files and organize my functions. It hurt my brain.

We recently finished a project that involved working with a group to build a single page app that had 3 dynamically populated (from 3 different API's) dropdown menu's. Once something was selected from the dropdown's, the selected options would then appear in an itinerary preview list, at which point a save button would enable, allowing the user to save these "planned trips" into a JSON database. We finished the project having successfully met MVP with a few extra features.
